articles.title: RFK. Jr’s family members call for his resignation, say he is a ‘threat’ to Americans’ health - PBS
articles.description: Kennedy's sister, Kerry Kennedy, and his nephew, Joseph P. Kennedy III, issued scathing statements Friday, calling for him to step down as health secretary following a contentious congressional hearing this past week.
articles.content: WASHINGTON (AP) Members of Robert F. Kennedy Jr.’s family are calling for him to step down as health secretary following a contentious congressional hearing this past week, during which the Trump Cab… [+1994 chars]
